pr_title: [FLINK-16031][python] Improve the description in the README file of PyFlink 1.9.x.

timeline.message: [FLINK-16031][python] Improve the description in the README file of PyFlink 1.9.x.

timeline.bodyText: We have not specified the version of python-dateutil in setup.py, so the version should be latest, instead of 2.8.0?
